HugsLib.UpdateFeatureDef.content: img:Quarantine |Are you playing while locked down in social isolation? Good! Because I'm taking this time to make RinWorld mods... and I need your help! |Hi, I'm JP, author of Open The Windows, Soft Warm Beds and other mods. Like many people around the world, my living has been impacted by the global efforts to contain the COVID-19 pandemic. I'm trying to stay clear of cabin fever and turn this into something productive. So I've been making mods! Now I'm putting up this one-time campaign on my Ko-Fi page as an incentive for those who are able to help me get through this. |I have three brand new mods that are ready to go, and I'll release them as donations reach three modest goals. And hey, coffee is cheap! If only a fraction of Open The Windows subscribers decide to take action, these mods will be out before we know it! |Follow the link above or go to https://ko-fi.com/jptrrs to contribute & check more details. |You can contact me anytime, on Ko-Fi or on Steam. Many, many thanks for your support! |Now go on, your colonists also need you! Have Fun!
